message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your position, but $120 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $170?
I'm still interested in the product, but $170 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for it.
